game.name: Goetia
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Goetia is a point & click adventure where you play the ghost of a young lady. You are Abigail. Abigail Blackwood.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Goetia is a point & click adventure where you play the ghost of a young lady. You are Abigail. Abigail Blackwood.

reviewHighlights.text: Goetia is a point-and-click gothic adventure developed by Sushee and published by Square Enix Collective. It tells the story of Abigail Blackwood, the...
